title: Natural, Non-Toxic Laundry Liquid
description: Ecologo certified and 100% biodegradable, this liquid laundry detergent is incredibly effective and highly concentrated. Phosphate-free, dye-free, chlorine-free.
text:
Puretergent
Laundry Liquid
Ecologo certified, 100% readily biodegradable, grey water safe
This laundry detergent is incredibly effective and highly concentrated. Works as well as leading brands and only requires one ounce per load. This laundry liquid goes the distance.
*Please note when purchasing "w/ container deposit," product will arrive in glass jar. When purchasing "aluminum," product will arrive in aluminum bottle with screw cap. If you would like a
[pump lid](https://www.pumpedbellingham.com/products/aluminum-bottle?variant=42484710834383), please purchase separately. Pump can be reused indefinitely.
Ingredients: Water, proprietary surfectant, laurel glucoside, tetrasodium iminodi-succinate. sodium polyaspartate, proprietary herbal blend
Does not contain: Phosphates, nonylphenol ethoxylates (NPEs), APEs. optical brighteners, SLS, gluten, coconut, palm or nut oils, dyes, preservatives, chlorine, animal products, or synthetic fragrance
Cautions: Keep out of reach of children. Mild eye irritant, harmful if swallowed. In case of eye contact, flush eye with cool water for 10 minutes. If swallowed, drink water and contact a physician.
